alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Knott; Magoffin; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 5:52AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Perry, northwestern Knott, Floyd, central Breathitt and southeastern Magoffin Counties through 630 AM EST... At 551 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Little, or 8 miles south of Jackson, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Flintville, Ned, Wilstacy and Dice around 555 AM EST. Noble, Hardshell, Rowdy, Press and Sikes around 600 AM EST. Buck, Daisydell, Lunah and Ary around 605 AM EST. Decoy, Elmrock, Lambric and Vest around 610 AM EST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Vail, Evanston, Waldo, Duco, Yellow Mountain, Mid, Gunlock, Orchard, Handshoe, Ordway, Fredville, Bolyn, Gapville, Estill, Wayland, Hueysville, Hippo, Pyramid, Bosco, Eastern, Garret, Porter Junction, Blue River, Martin, Allen, Alphoretta, Langley, Printer, Arkansas, Hunter, Beaver Junction, Allen City and Dana. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
